mapper.select: select sa.*,sst.student_name,sst.student_sex,sc.class_num from sybida_audition sa inner join sybida_student sst on sa.audition_student_id=sst.student_id inner join sybida_class sc on sst.student_class_id=sc.class_id where sa.audition_student_id = #{auditionStudentId} and sa.audition_null1 = 1

select sa.*,sst.student_name,sst.student_sex,sc.class_num from sybida_audition sa inner join sybida_student sst on sa.audition_student_id=sst.student_id inner join sybida_class sc on sst.student_class_id=sc.class_id where sa.audition_id = #{auditionId}
